snippet: “American Hustle” left a messy Golden Globes as the big winner on Sunday, winning three major awards, including best comedy. But voters stayed true to form and spread their love around.
abstract: Brooks Barnes and Michael Cieply The Carpetbagger column notes Golden Globe Award winners and remarks on awards ceremony telecast.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and MICHAEL CIEPLY

lead_paragraph: “American Hustle” left a messy Golden Globes as the big winner on Sunday, winning three major awards, including best comedy. But voters stayed true to form and spread their love around.

headline.seo: ‘American Hustle’ and ‘12 Years a Slave’ Win at the Golden Globes
headline.main: Bragging Rights to Share at the Golden Globes
headline.print_headline: Bragging Rights to Share at Globes
